item.title: Getting Started With Git
item.description: Hi there! Over the past few days I’ve seen people around me struggle with Git. This tutorial is an attempt to get them started in the right direction. This by no means is a complete reference to Git. For a complete reference kindly take a look at Atlassian’s Git Tutorial. I’ve tried to make this content as easy and comprehensible as possible. What is a VCS? VCS stands for Version Control System.
